text: No Good Deed is a 2017 superhero comedy movie based upon the fictional character known as Deadpool. The movie was directed by David Leitch. ==Plot== Deadpool spots an elderly man getting mugged and decides to change into his supersuit in a phone booth. However, he stayed in for a little too long before the man was killed. He wondered why a phone booth still exists. ==Other websites== * Category:2017 movies Category:2010s superhero movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Screenplays by Paul Wernick Category:Screenplays by Rhett Reese Category:X-Men movies Category:Deadpool movies Category:Short movies Category:Movies directed by David Leitch
title: No Good Deed (movie)
